awards.text: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 12 wins & 11 nominations.

fullplot: A young boy makes a wish at a carnival machine to be big. He wakes up the following morning to find that it has been granted and his body has grown older overnight. But he is still the same 12-year-old boy inside. Now he must learn how to cope with the unfamiliar world of grown-ups including getting a job and having his first romantic encounter with a woman. What will he find out about this strange world?
plot: When a boy wishes to be big at a magic wish machine, he wakes up the next morning and finds himself in an adult body.
title: Big

tomatoes.consensus: Refreshingly sweet and undeniably funny, Big is a showcase for Tom Hanks, who dives into his role and infuses it with charm and surprising poignancy.
